summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to land use and zoning; adopting a new Major Institution Master Plan for Seattle Children's Hospital; and amending Chapter 23.32 of the Seattle Municipal Code at Page 63 of the Official Land Use Map, to modify height limits and rezone property to and within the Major Institution Overlay, all generally located along Sand Point Way Northeast (Project Numbers 3007521 and 3007696, Clerk File 308884).
note: Children's Hospital Major Institution Master Plan
